mapper.insert: insert into ur_reply (rno, urkey, reply, replyer) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{urkey}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.select: select rno, urkey, reply, replyer, replyDate, updatedate from ur_reply where urkey = #{urkey} order by rno asc
select count(rno) from ur_reply where urkey = #{urkey}
